thread.section_title: eTurboNews (eTN) - Original and unique global international news with a focus on travel and tourism
thread.title: Jin Air is launching Jin Market Fare Deal for 10 days
thread.title_full: Jin Air is launching Jin Market Fare Deal for 10 days

author: Assignment Editor
title: Jin Air is launching Jin Market Fare Deal for 10 days
text:
Jin Air is launching Jin Market Fare Deal for 10 days   31, 2015 eTN   
Jin Air, a representative of Korea LCC, is starting JIN MARKET fare deal which guarantees reasonable fares when flying to Korea. Jin Market is offering up to 73% off for a ticket to Korea. 
The JIN MARKET promotion will last for 10 days, starting from 10:00 on August 31, 2015 until 24:00 on September 9, 2015 (KST). It will be eligible for passengers boarding from September 1, 2015 to March 26, 2016, except for some peak days. 
Customers can purchase tickets via Jin Air’s website and mobile application (English version). 
This time, JIN MARKET will be opened to a total of 16 international destinations, including flights from Nagasaki, Sapporo, Okinawa, Osaka, Fukuoka, Hong Kong, Macau, Bangkok, Cebu, Clark Field, Vientiane and Kota Kinabalu to Incheon and two flights from Shanghai and Xi’an to Jeju. It will also include Osaka– Busan and Cebu–Busan routes which will be launched on September 25, 2015. 
Highlights of round trip fares for JIN MARKET promotion include (exclude taxes): 
Nagasaki – Incheon for JPY 6,000 Sapporo – Incheon for JPY 16,500 Okinawa – Incheon for JPY 14,000 Osaka – Incheon for JPY 9,000 Fukuoka – Incheon for JPY 65,000 Hong Kong – Incheon for HKD 900 Macau – Incheon for MOP 900 Bangkok – Incheon for THB 6,000. 
To celebrate for this exciting promotion, Jin Air is also launching a variety of additional benefits for its passengers. The airline will be offering Etude House cosmetics special kits to passengers who have purchased tickets by Visa card during the promotion period. Moreover, a USIM card (with KRW 30,000 value) will be offered exclusively to foreign passengers who have booked their hotel accommodation through Booking.com. 
At the same time, the 'JIN AIR TOUR PROJECT: Truth-Good-Beauty' program will be launched in celebration of the JIN MARKET, offering up to 50% discount at selected retailers, such as Everland & Caribbean Bay, for passengers who downloaded e-coupons from Jin Air's website as well as 10%~35% discount for BIBAP, The Painters: HERO, NATURE REPUBLIC and JOGEYSA Templestay for visitors carrying Jin Air’s international flight tickets.
